title: Thai-style tofu and peanut salad
description: This crunchy Thai-style tofu and peanut salad makes a healthy and satisfying vegetarian meal for two â€“ and it comes with a kick.
ingredients: 4 tbsp Thai sweet chilli dipping sauce

method.Step 1: Drain the tofu, pat dry with kitchen paper and cut into chunky bite-size pieces. Put into a bowl, add 2 tablespoons Thai sweet chilli dipping sauce and 1 tablespoon dark soy sauce. Toss together and set aside to marinate for 15 minutes.

method.Step 2: Heat 1 tablespoon toasted sesame oil in a wok or large frying pan over a medium-high heat. When hot, add the tofu and cook for 3-4 minutes, turning halfway, until golden and sticky. Set aside in a large bowl to cool slightly.

method.Step 3: Add the vegetable and beansprout stir-fry, the roasted peanuts, roughly chopped, and 2 tablespoons Thai sweet chilli dipping sauce and toss together well.

method.Step 4: Divide between 2 wide bowls and scatter with extra roasted peanuts, roughly chopped. Serve with extra dark soy sauce, to drizzle over.
